NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need to use location services in order to provide address directions and to show registered companies that are close to you. Do you confirm?
NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera so that you can send photos while sending messages to companies and creating product requests. Do you confirm?
cameraPermission: We need access to your camera so that you can send photos while sending messages to companies and creating product requests. Do you confirm?

photosPermission: We need to access your image gallery so that you can send photos while sending messages to companies and creating product requests. Do you confirm?
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need your permission to save the selected photos in your gallery. Do you confirm?
savePhotosPermission: We need your permission to save the selected photos in your gallery. Do you confirm?
